name: 2022 4th International Conference on Robotics and Computer Vision
content: Paper Publication: Accepted full papers will published into ICRCV 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main academical databases. Special Issue \[Sensors\] High Visibility: indexed within Scopus, SCIE (Web of Science), PubMed, MEDLINE, PMC, Embase, Ei Compendex, Inspec, and many other databases. Impact Factor: 3.576 (2020) ; 5-Year Impact Factor: 3.735 (2020)
